short_summary: Collaborative furniture for Statistics Canada in Ottawa
description: Collaborative products required for statistics Canada
full_summary:
# Collaborative Furniture Tender Announcement
### Title
Collaborative Furniture

### Reference Number
cb-967-5635822

### Solicitation Number
J078599

### Publication Date
2024-11-21

### Tender Closing Date
2024-12-02T14:00:00

### Supply Solicitation Details
This tender is a RFP (Request for Proposal) against a Supply Arrangement. The procurement method is competitive and selective tendering. Multiple traders from Canada are eligible to submit their proposals. The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD).

### Contract Details
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-12-06
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

### Procurement Details
- **NOTICE TYPE**: RFP against Supply Arrangement (PSIB-stream of Suppliers)
- **PROCUREMENT METHOD**: Competitive and selective tendering
- **�LECTION CRITERIA**: Lowest Price

### Notices
The procurement will be done in accordance with the Federal Supply Class (FSC) 7410, office furniture. The trade agreements associated with this procurement are not applicable.

### Region of Opportunity
The procurement opportunity is only open to businesses registered in Canada.

### Region of Delivery
The delivery of office furniture will be to the National Capital Region (NCR) and Ottawa, Ontario.

### Solicitation Entity
The solicitation entity is Statistics Canada.

### Contact Information
You may submit a proposal to participate in this procurement by contacting the following individual.

- **Name**: Michael Peters 
- **Email**: [statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: 343-576-9483

### Attachments
You can download the tender notice and related documents at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52409/j078599---npp.pdf 
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52409/j078599---rfp.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52409/j078599---apn.pdf 
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52409/j078599---ddp.pdf
